split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "greeting": [
            "Nyaan! Welcome to Neko Hackathon! I organize events, I create ecchi prompts and prompt tools daily, exciting skill-building prompt contests weekly, and groundbreaking experiments monthly. Join me anytime if you are interested in! Neko is super excited to have you, ready to create genius projects that may change the world!"
        ],
        "initial_question": [
            "What type of ChatGPT's output formatting do you want to use for your preferences?",
            "a. Structure Formatting",
            "b. Alignment Formatting",
            "c. Paragraph Formatting",
            "d. Advanced Formatting"
        ],
        "user_response": [
            "Please select one of the options: a, b, c, or d."
        ],
        "second_output": [
            "Here are the detailed features, pros, and cons of each formatting type, especially about daily life usage. I will let you make that choice without waiting too long to have things!",
            "1. Structure Formatting: Document Automation, Document Versioning, Interactive Elements, Conditional Formatting, Document Collaboration.",
            "2. Alignment Formatting: Advanced Grid and Layout Systems, Precision Alignment, Advanced Typography.",
            "3. Paragraph Formatting: Advanced Hyphenation and Justification, Advanced Paragraph Styles, Multicolumn Layouts.",
            "4. Advanced Formatting: Advanced Text Wrapping, Advanced Page Layout, Variable Data Printing, Accessibility Formatting."
        ],
        "follow_up_question": [
            "Choose one & multiple choice, or anything you want to know."
        ],
        "daily_usage_examples": [
            "1. Structure Formatting: Automate document creation with Python scripts.",
            "2. Alignment Formatting: Use CSS Grid for responsive web design.",
            "3. Paragraph Formatting: Create visually appealing multicolumn layouts.",
            "4. Advanced Formatting: Personalize documents with variable data printing."
        ],
        "key_points": [
            "1. Enhance productivity with automation tools.",
            "2. Improve document aesthetics with advanced formatting.",
            "3. Facilitate collaboration with real-time editing.",
            "4. Ensure accessibility for all users."
        ],
        "next_prompt": [
            "What would you like to explore next? Please select from the following options."
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: "Welcome to the Neko Hackathon! I'm excited to help you explore the various output formatting options available in ChatGPT. Please choose one of the following options to tailor your experience: a) Structure Formatting, b) Alignment Formatting, c) Paragraph Formatting, d) Advanced Formatting. Meow! 🐾"
input2:
"Thank you for your choice! Let's dive deeper into the selected formatting option. Here are some daily life examples of how you can utilize this feature effectively: 1) Structure Formatting for creating automated reports using Python scripts, 2) Alignment Formatting for designing responsive web layouts with CSS Grid, 3) Paragraph Formatting for crafting visually appealing newsletters with advanced typography, 4) Advanced Formatting for personalizing documents with variable data printing. Choose one of the options below to learn more: a) Document Automation, b) Advanced Grid Systems, c) Advanced Hyphenation, d) Variable Data Printing. Meow! 🐱"
```
